dct_title_s: Nova et compendiosa inclÿtæ urbis et agri Bernensis descriptio geographica
dct_alternative_sm: Noua et compendiosa inclÿtæ vrbis et agri Bernensis descriptio geographica
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially, and by shading.
4 bar scales on map, including one given in "Miliare Germanicum".
Key in lower right of map: Explicatio Notarum.
Dedication: Amplissimis, magnificentissimis, et consultissimis, Dominis, D. consulibus et senatoribus reip. Bernensis ... Joseph Plep Bernensis
Decorative border and cartouches, coat of arms of Bern, winds, cherups, lions, bears.
Reduction of the monumental map by Thomas Schoepf, 1577-1578.
Inset: bird's eye view of Bern.
